name: try_solidity
description: - **VS Code** OR **[Remix](https://remix.ethereum.org/#optimize=false&runs=200&evmVersion=null&version=soljson-v0.8.7+commit.e28d00a7.js)** - an IDE which lets us write **Solidity** code without setting up a local environment. ##### Concepts and terms: - **Solidity** - a contract-oriented, high-level programming language used for implementing smart contracts - **Smart contracts** - code that gets executed on the Blockchain
